name: Procrastination (kakalambo)
description:
Procrastination is a mini-game where u have to fight your inner devils. I made it for a 3-hour game jam with the theme "YOU!",  but took me to long to upload it in time  and way more than 3 hours (about 1 Day). I developed the game with Unity and did the art in photoshop.

Audio: https://freesound.org/  

Q - Attack

W - Block

Space - Jump

Arrow left - move left

Arrow right - move right
